programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: BLACKPINK is in Japan for a tour! After a successful concert, the members buy groceries for some home-cooking. The members split to explore the day on their own. Rosé goes to the LP record shop and aquarium while Jisoo goes to a dog school. Rosé and Jennie compete in bowling.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: BLACKPINK has their day off in a Korean-style sauna (JjimJilBang), then goes to play some snowboarding. Will they survive the extreme sports of snowboarding or enjoy sleds? Watch to find out!
